General.Name: Bionovate Technologies Corp
General.Description: Bionovate Technologies Corp., a medical device company, focuses on developing automated treatment for age spots. It intends to develop automated computerized system that treats age spots anywhere on the body. The company targets to sell its systems to physicians and spas worldwide. The company was formerly known as MJP International Ltd. and changed its name to Bionovate Technologies Corp. in December 2017. Bionovate Technologies Corp. was founded in 2010 and is based in Cham, Switzerland. As of October 7, 2020, Bionovate Technologies Corp. operates as a subsidiary of Human Data AG.

0.Name: Mr. Timothy  Jones
0.Title: Pres, CEO, CFO, Sec., Treasurer & Director
